# Titanic â€“ Problem Understanding

## Objective
Predict whether a passenger survived the Titanic disaster.

## Problem Type
Binary classification.

## Evaluation Metric
Accuracy.

## Dataset Overview
- Tabular data
- Mix of numerical and categorical features
- Contains missing values

## Known Risks
- Data leakage
- Overfitting to leaderboard
- Improper validation strategy

## Personal Goals
- Build a clean baseline
- Use proper validation
- Understand feature impact
